
! WARNING !:
	Make sure you register the unity container at the application startup. For example use the following for default registration:
	
	Container.Configure();

	For more registration options check the Container class documentation.

Information about the Utilities.Web Dependency structure:

Web	 (Full package)
	Core (Only binaries)
		KendoUI.Core
	Icons 
	Scripts
	  Themes	
		Themes.Common
		Themes.Mack
			Themes.Common
		Themes.MackDual
			Themes.Common
		Themes.Renault
			Themes.Common
		Themes.Violin
			Themes.Common
		Themes.VolvoBA
			Themes.Common
		Themes.VolvoGroup
			Themes.Common
	KendoUI.ContentFiles
